goals__remit:
Euros / Agency is an independent consulting agency based in Brussels and Paris, which works with the management of private & public organizations to define and implement communication and influence strategies. 
 
Since 2012, we have been working with a broad range of organisations based in Europe and abroad, through high-quality and tailor-made support. 
 
Committed to the results-based culture, methodological rigor and outspokenness, we team up with our clients over the long term to meet their image, reputation and public decision-making challenges. 
 
Our areas of intervention cover all aspects of communication advisory, press relations, public diplomacy, European & national public affairs.
customers: Observatoire des Think Tanks# Confédération européenne des Syndicats# European University Institute# UNESCO# EU Start Up Prize# Ville de Sada# EU China Tourism Year# Harley-Davidson# Deliveroo# Port de Calais# Portland PR Ltd# Snap Group Ltd# CITEO# Villes de France# Alliance Française Bruxelles-Europe# Index Ventures
